participant_1.background:
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i like watching ufc fights.
i barely show up to work.
I value my memories with my cat more than anything in the world.
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.

participant_2.background:
I like to be comfortable when I'm working so I usually wear scrubs.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life.
my best friend lives in a big city.
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Great! Just got back from a trip to London and now I'm relaxing at home. What about you?
My day is going well, thanks for asking! I'm just hanging out with my kids, getting ready for their sports events tomorrow.
That sounds fun! I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life. I'm a nurse and I love my job, but I also have a lot of hobbies and interests that I want to pursue.
I understand. I used to work as a nurse, but I had to quit because I couldn't balance my work and my family life. Now I'm a stay-at-home mom and I love it!
I'm glad you found a job that you love and that allows you to spend time with your family. I'm sure your kids appreciate it!
I can tell. You're a great mom!
You're welcome! I'm going to go make some dinner now. It was nice chatting with you!
You too! Have a good night!
